Main calibration set:
```{r}
table(ds2$country, ds2$app.mthd)
dim(ds2)
dim(d2)
```

Ranges etc.

```{r}
dfsumm(ds2[, c('man.dm', 'man.ph')])
dfsumm(d2[, c('air.temp', 'wind.2m', 'ct')])
```

Quantiles.


```{r}
apply(ds2[, c('man.dm', 'man.ph')], 2, quantile, 0:20 / 20)
apply(d2[, c('air.temp', 'wind.2m', 'ct')], 2, quantile, 0:20 / 20)
```
